publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1321 Angus MacKay: Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2000-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2000 be approved.

S1M-1321 Angus MacKay: Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2000-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2000 be approved.

S1M-1321 Angus MacKay: Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2000-That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2000 be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
